title: General
fullText:
A connectable electrical installation battery installed externally to a connectable electrical installation shall be installed either in â€”
(a) a battery compartment inclusive of spill tray and ventilation; or
(b) open to the environment including a spill tray.
"Externally" means open to the environment or not anywhere within the enclosed structure of the connectable electrical installation. For example, a wall, compartment or barrier that prevents the egress of gases into the habitable area.
